oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Old Habits Are Hard To Break performance
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of Old Habits Are Hard To Break, written by Jerry Grant and Cecil Bentz, and performed by an unidentified male voice with piano accompaniment. Recording is most likely a demo performance.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) [Unidentified] performs "Old Habits Are Hard To Break"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: "Old Habits Are Hard To Break" sheet music [photocopy of handwriting] stored with transcription documents, Box 5
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bentz, Cecil
